attributes.action: Require the resignation of the Home Secretary, Jacqui Smith MP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretary has demonstrated a total and calculated lack of integrity in her disregard of the latest pay agreement.  She should resign immediately or be required to do so by the Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
